meta.description: I'm a full-stack developer with 10 years of experience in the software industry. Passionate about optimizing processes and user experiences, I focus on solving problems through software and creativity. My approach is always driven by finding the right technology for the specific challenge, ensuring good practices and writing clean, reusable code.
